test.description: Handling of parent:: and ancestor:: axes
test.name: oxf:java

test.description: Expression both returning a node and using the node value in predicate
test.name: oxf:java

test.description: Binding depending on variable scoped in parent container
test.name: oxf:java

test.description: Simple change of control validity based on MIP
test.name: oxf:pipeline

mip.name: relevant
mip.expression: for $u in ../units return $u castable as xs:decimal and $u > 0

analysis.expression: xs:boolean((for $u in ../units return $u castable as xs:decimal and $u > 0)[1])

mip.name: calculate
mip.expression: if (../units castable as xs:integer and ../price castable as xs:decimal) then ../units * ../price else '-'

analysis.expression: xs:string((if (../units castable as xs:integer and ../price castable as xs:decimal) then ../units * ../price else '-')[1])

mip.name: calculate
mip.expression: sum(for $t in ../../items/item/total[. castable as xs:decimal] return $t)

analysis.expression: xs:string((sum(for $t in ../../items/item/total[. castable as xs:decimal] return $t))[1])

mip.name: calculate
mip.expression: for $t in ../subtotal + ../tax return if ($t > 4000) then $t else $t * 0.9

analysis.expression: xs:string((for $t in ../subtotal + ../tax return if ($t > 4000) then $t else $t * 0.9)[1])

test.description: PO example: change to values causing change to MIPs
test.name: oxf:pipeline
